page.text: The mighty tyrant lizard has been brought low. Her primeval power you have overcome and brought low. Her figure is impressive still even slumped into a heap on the ground and panting, tongue lolling out as she watches you warily.

choice.text: show her who the real predator is
Conquer her with your feminine folds

page.text: The beast is muscular, powerful..firm of body. In every way the anthropomorphic dinosaur is imposing..so it is an irresistable prospect to take that hardness and strength and submit it to the softness of your nethers. To take her and gush her up in your womb. You stand astrid her and grab her reptilian muzzle, shoving her head up between your thighs with a mhmmm. That snout of hers parting your netherlips, sliding into the hot and dripping channel of your sex. The tyrant lizard struggling in vain to resist her fate but unable to overcome your desire that she be conquered by your pussy.

You squat down over the tyrant's shoulders, claiming more of the mighty lizard. She writhes and struggles against your silken embrace but as you pin her upper arms she can do even less to resist. Though her struggling squirms as she starts to slide up into your voracious womb feel exhilerating..scaled hard muscles rubbing against the inside of your nethers. Her frame well lubricated by your free flowing love juices and being conquered inch by inch as you start drawing her in with your internal muscles now, working over her chest and abs..your middle bulging out mightily as she's overcome, dominated and contained within you.

The tyrant growls impotently against the insides of your womb as her upper body becomes immensely gravid, pregnant and bulging with her form. Your lustful juices spill down her legs and tail as they protrude from your netherlips and are gradually drawn in and conquered. The dinosaur woman's might finally being conquered entirely as juices drip from her tail and claw -tips into the dirt. Your nethers sealing up behind her tailtip as a moan inducing thrill of satisfaction and dominance runs through you. Her powerful form writhing, sealed helplessly in your womb and soon to be reduced to mere feminine fluids.

You slide one hand over your belly. You can feel the trapped dino woman thrash around under your skin in response to your possessive caress. But you slide your hand further down, between your legs, caressing your folds as you savour her squirms..and turn up the heat on her. Your moaning delight mingling with the muffled growls and grunts of your furiously squirming prey as your pleasure builds. Working up as she's ground down by your walls until with a sudden shift in pitch the tyrant lizard finds herself unmade, her growl turning into a squeel and then a sloshing as your womb clenches down upon her...the feeling making you weak in the knees and soon after you climax, sending her remnants splattering out in a flood onto the dirt. All that she was now just a flush on your cheeks and a puddle at your feet as you pant there and luxuriate in the aftermath of your conquest...

This reptilian and beastial creature thought her raw might could make a prey out of you. It's only fitting then that you show her the depths of her mistake, and even if she won't comprehend it you've worked up an appetite that needs satisfying. Weakened from your triumph she fails to fend you off as you pin her clawed arms and grab ahold of her toothy snout, holding her jaws together and bringing them to meet your lips. The tyrant lizard lets out a growl as she realizes what you're about to do and struggles, thrashing around under you but she can't stop you from engulfing her head with your lips and start to swallow her alive.

The lizard's eyes flick around wildly in their sockets as you worked her jaws down your throat and then engulfed her head completely. Her powerful shoulders next to succumb to your ravenous hunger as you eat her alive. Her anthropomorphic reptile's mammalian mammaries sliding pleasingly over your tongue and down your throat shortly afterwards as you gobble her up despite her struggles.

The mighty tyrant lizard proves no match for your hunger as you swallow your larger prey inches at a time, your gut distending and bulging out as you force her writhing form down into your stomach. Her bellows of outrage, with perhaps a tinge of fear, nicely muffled as you work her meaty hips past your jaws. Soon all of her will be trapped inside you and you can't help but run your hands off your stretched belly and trace over the outline of her head and rub it in that the reptile will soon be nothing but your food.

Her tail, her legs, her clawed feet. Gradually you polish each and every part of her off, swallowing her down with vigorous glucking gulps until the last of her vanishes past your lips. The monstrous dino woman growling and thrashing around to try and escape your insides, but there's no escape oh no the lesson isn't finished yet.

You hear the lizard growl defiantly and it makes you smirk, your gut starting to squeeze and gurgle around her. Your meal seeming to realize what's happening and redouble her struggles, jostling your gut around as your digestive processes set about grinding her down into mush. Her endurance is prolonged, but your triumph is inevitable as you churn her down into a soft and still lump of nourishment within her. From there it's delicious and oh so satisfying to soak up her remnant, your gut shrinking back down as you absorb the so called tyrant lizard.
You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.
